name: Dex
notes: During the installation process, it will ask you to calibrate your gamepad. Just press Esc if you wish to escape it.

files.archive: N/A:Please select the ".tar.gz" archive downloaded from "https://www.humblebundle.com/".

content:
files:
- archive: N/A:Please select the ".tar.gz" archive downloaded from "https://www.humblebundle.com/".
game:
  appid: 269650
  exe: Dex.x86
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: archive
- chmodx: GamepadConfigTool.x86
- execute:
    description: Setup your gamepad.
    file: $GAMEDIR/GamepadConfigTool.x86
    terminal: true
- chmodx: Dex.x86
